sections.content: Data preparation is the process of turning messy, scattered, and incomplete data into a clean, usable, and reliable format for analysis. AI-driven automation strengthens data preparation by detecting and correcting errors to maintain accuracy, making the entire flow and transformation of data visible for transparency, and preserving both past and present details so historical trends remain intact. Preserving both old and new details so historical insights are never lost.
